alert.note: Alert for Northwest Blue Mountains (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 25 at 4:55AM PDT until March 25 at 11:00AM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM PDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Total snow accumulations of 14 to 18 inches above 4500 feet. * WHERE...In Oregon, Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon. In Washington, Northwest Blue Mountains. * WHEN...Until 11 AM PDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Visibilities could be reduced in heavy snow.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained for Oregon by calling 5 1 1 or by visiting online at https://tripcheck.com, or for Washington by visiting online at https://wsdot.com/travel.
